org.ezze.utils.ui.aboutbox
Class AboutBoxInformation

java.lang.Object
  org.ezze.utils.ui.aboutbox.AboutBoxInformation
Direct Known Subclasses:
DesktopAboutBoxInformation
public abstract class AboutBoxInformation
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class to extend for providing an information for application's about box AboutBox.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Dmitriy Pushkov

Field Detail

informationLines

protected java.util.ArrayList<AboutBoxInformation.InformationLine> informationLines
Collects a set information lines AboutBoxInformation.InformationLine to display in AboutBox. One can extend about information adding new information lines using addInformationLine(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String) method.

See Also:
addInformationLine(java.lang.String), addInformationLine(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), addInformationLine(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
